attributes.action: To order a public enquiry into the third class treatment of war disablement pensioners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Service Personnel and Veterans Agency treats war disablement pensioners like they were scum. We are forced to degrade ourselves for a few extra pounds a month. Claim forms, GP's reports, medical notes and welfare officers appear to be reglarly ignored. Many of us have to rely on the charity of others for basic needs.  We get no help from the SPVA with priority treatment certificates.
 
Deterioration claims take months to process and are routinely rejected, triggering an even longer appeals process.  

We deserve better.
